website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set that includes plenty of accessories.
pros: If you are looking to serve your mules in style, this set of four copper mugs is a great option
Rather than the traditional rounded shape, these mugs have straight sides for a different look
This set includes a shot glass, four copper straws, and four wooden coasters
The mugs are handmade and 100% copper with a food-safe lacquer
cons: Some concerns that mugs may not be 100% copper

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: First off these mugs are absolutely gorgeous! The color just pops. These work great if you are hosting a party, they are definitely a conversation starter. I was concerned at first about the potential metal taste that some cups have when drinking from them but that was not the case with these, thank goodness. It was really great that the set also came with coasters, I haven’t used them yet but they are really nice as well. This set would make for a great gift, at least that was the hint that was brought up during the conversation it sparked.
customer_reviews.author: Slamphere

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: If each premium copper mug is coated with safe, food-grade lacquer inside and out that makes it tarnish resistant. Why it rusty right after couple use. So your mugs stay looking ugly over time. sad! It was happy when you just receive it. It looks so shiny. Now I don't know if it is safe. And the price is high. I would say this is a dollar store product.
customer_reviews.author: xue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set..
customer_reviews.text: These mugs were the perfect gift for my aunt that loves to make mules. They are sturdy and come well packaged. There are also washing/ care instructions included in the box. The straws, coasters and copper shot glass are a great add on! Needless to say, my aunt loved this gift set! She’s very impressed and happy and so was I...
customer_reviews.author: Shameca

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. I'm glad that it copper on the inside too, cause most I found in places like Walmart and target, they were stainless steel on the inside, but these are copper inside the cup. The only thing I found was a tiny chip on the top edge of the handle on one, but not noticeable unless you are looking for it, and the spot is not in an area where you sip. But, overall for the price, these are great and beautiful. Seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: constantlyonthemove

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my former copper mugs got carroded these past 4 years. I like to have these hanging around the holidays, so pretty! Very excited. The copper straws were a great addition as well as the minicup! Though I don't actually make Moscow mules we're excited to use the mini cup for Santa's mouses milk on Christmas Eve;)
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift set
customer_reviews.text: We have used a mugs a couple of times. The copper straws are really nice and have made me want to purchase some other metal straws vs. my plastic ones. We plan on purchasing another couple so we have a set of 6-8. So far...so good. I have seen other mugs lose their handles that have been welded on, so far these are holding firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Chipped Mug ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Read awesome reviews in regards to the set. Was super excited to get mine but super bummed that two of the coasters ink had finger print smears and one of the mugs is not fully sealed and is chipped in the bottom. Just wanting a new mug because I am afraid to wash the one that’s chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cup is deteriorating and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product up until I saw what looks like copper painting start to come off the cup. once the handle came off I realize that this was not 100% copper what are we drinking out of ? I’m not pleased. Wish I would’ve known to notice this sooner I would’ve asked for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Janee Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by these cups. The quality of these copper cups are 100% on point. And when the company reached out to me about my receiving them and some of the cups had damage on the bottom the made it right by sending replacements for the cups. There customer service was astounding. Me and my kids love using the cups for drinking water out of. They keep cold for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these larger mugs! I have not put them in the dishwasher as they are so easy to quickly hand wash. They stay cold and keep beverages nice and cold for an extended time! Would make a great shower gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and also neat Accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pieces with a lot of neat and pretty accessories. So far no problems. The customer service was good as well
customer_reviews.author: Saffire Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Must buy set
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely beautiful. Purchased for our personal use but would not hesitate to give this set as a gift. Looks much more expensive than the price reflects. A really great deal.
customer_reviews.author: vg2202

customer_reviews.title: They are big enough
customer_reviews.text: I Love these cups, they are big enough so that all you need is one drink. They stay ice cold for as long as your drinking your Mule. They are also very tasteful looking.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of copper mugs and copper straws. I like the handles on these as they are easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and pretty to look at!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging display was great!! It even came with nice coasters. I would recommend this for a gift or to add to any bar collection. They’re very durable and have some weight to them so they don’t feel cheap. I was very please with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about different sets and this one was spot on- great set and packaged so nicely! Great quality, and I'm so excited about them!
customer_reviews.author: bsolberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality very nicely wrapped well worth the money I paid At the moment I can’t comment on their ability but they look very high-quality and the seller contacted me with additional tips which were appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kadi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work effectively
customer_reviews.text: Ice melted in mugs just as quickly as a regular glass. That defeats the purpose of the Moscow mule mug. Not sure if its a cheap version and this is why or what is wrong with them. Very unhappy and already through the packaging away as I never expected an issue with a mug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These copper mugs and shot glass are beautiful. The coasters are nice too. I am very pleased with them. Don’t let a Moscow Mule residue sit overnight in a mug, because it will eat the bottom surface a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Straws are poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The straws arrived with sharp metal jagged pieces on the end. Love the cups though, and the set makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malave

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous copper mug set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to give as a gift, and I’m sure they will be a hit. The hammered copper is simply gorgeous. The coasters, straws, and shot glass that come with the four mugs are nice extras, too.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Price Increase
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and feel of these mugs. I purchased a set to test the quality and they were only $20 a couple weeks ago. However, when I went back to order several more for my wedding the price went up to $33. I was so disappointed to have found this great product but to no longer have it in my budget. I will have to look elsewhere to find cups just as nice but at a more reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have only used these cups two or three times and they are showing signs of wear. The straws look like we've had them for years rather than just weeks. The finish on them and the cups is starting to wear. This was an anniversary gift and while they are great for keeping drinks chilled I am not happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful and I know my brother in law is going to live it! Perfect Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Phair

customer_reviews.title: Value is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I enjoy these mugs greatly it’s a great thing to have friends over and experience making some interesting drinks that we can drink together with the wonderful straws that come with it
customer_reviews.author: K&A Dryden

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous mugs! They're durable, thick and a good weight not flimsy. The perfect size. I love the additional coasters and straws. Great for parties, gifts or just to display.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs! Well made and beautiful workmanship. I keep them in the freezer ready for use at all times. Definitely keeps your Moscow Mule cold or any other beverage of choice. Two or 3 cocktails in and the mugs are still cold.
customer_reviews.author: METRO 330

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a Christmas gift and the recipient loved them. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Y. Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge Moscow Mule fan and have gotten my entire extended family to the same level of obsession, so I saw these while they were on sale and just decided why not, I could always use more copper cups. They have quickly become my favorite set! Love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for making mules for friends!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful copper mug set! Came with coasters, metal straws, and a shot glass made of copper!

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets one for my family and another for extended family and we love them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Functional but scuffed & uglier than pics shown
customer_reviews.text: Each item in the set was scuffed up and the coasters look like crap compared to what they show in the pics. If you want something of nice quality i'd recommend not purchasing these. They do function, though so did the clay cup I made in pre-k.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin

customer_reviews.title: Well built and beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, durable, & attractive!
customer_reviews.text: The copper mugs are very good quality! Heavy, durable, and attractive! Gave these to my adult son for Christmas and he loved them! Nice size with a large handle for easy grip! They are packaged in a very nice box for gift giving as well!

customer_reviews.title: David Coppermug
customer_reviews.text: Just fill the cup up and watch the drink disappear! These cups are a good value. They are durable and have a comfortable grip. Whether your a Moscow mule fan or just want a cool looking cup to enjoy drinking ice cold beverages out of. We would recommend these cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Materials were a little thin. Was thinking they would be heavier for better temperature retention. Otherwise, I was happy with the product.

customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and keeps drink cold . Got a lot of compliments on this set.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and great quality for an amazing price. I have been looking locally and online for an affordable set and this was perfect. It not only comes with 16oz cups but copper straws and wooden coasters.

customer_reviews.title: Order these you will love them
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these Every day. For water and Moscow Mules. Very beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and what a great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the beauty of them and it came with a copper jigger, copper straws and coasters!! I would most definitely give this as a gift!

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I read a description for a product and it states "Hand Made" I automatically look to purchase it. Craftsmanship and Quality are things I respect and this set is an excellent example of both.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a gift box and included vodka, limes and ginger beer Recipient loved it. This came promptly and the mugs were lovely!

customer_reviews.title: Best mule set!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best mule cups I’ve had/used and I LOVE the straws it comes with - it makes those mules go down even easier than usual. ;)

customer_reviews.title: Class Act!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are stunning and priced very reasonably. We had Moscow Mules in Ireland and are now very excited to be able to make them in our own house with the right mugs!

customer_reviews.title: One lone rounded cup
customer_reviews.text: I think they are great except I got one rounded cup that was different than all the rest? I wonder if this was a mistake?

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied

customer_reviews.text: The mugs are amazing great quality would purchase again. Cannot go wrong with this set.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of mugs - bought another set!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived very well packaged, and the mugs arrived in perfect condition. They show great craftsmanship, and the straws and shot cup are awesome. I prepared a drink, and immediately noticed how cold the mug was, including the handle. Sipping through the straw was awesome, as it was cold as well. The mug tends to keep ice longer, which prevents the drink to get watered down. I recommend these mugs for any cold drink, and would think that this set would be an awesome gift for friends and family. I purchased another set for myself to entertain company!
customer_reviews.author: tazman

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I got them for Hubby for Valentine's day. We both love Moscow Mules. The price was the best part, for 4 mugs 4 straws a shot glass and 4 wooden coaster..$20 glad I got in on that sale. They are totally worth any price.
customer_reviews.author: Carri

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful to look at. I’m using one of the mugs for when I brush my teeth so that hopefully I get some copper into my system. It’s considered to be antibacterial. It also looks nice on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value for the cost. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our kitchen so, we wanted new mugs that would compliment our new decor. These mugs were a perfect addition. I display them next to my cherry wood glass cabinets. My kitchen contractor stopped by the day after I displayed them and the mugs were one of the first things that he mentioned in his compliments. They also come with copper straws, wood coasters and a copper shot glass. My wife loves to keep the shot glass displayed on our bar. Exceptional value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cjay2101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party set
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted some of these mugs for a long time, decided to give this set a try. Love them and will definitely order more to have a full party set. Great size too.
customer_reviews.author: Karena M.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PUT IN DISHWASHER!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived and we super nice and pretty. Thought Id give them a wash before use, stuck them in the dishwasher aaaand they are all discolored with white marks. Unfortunately no notice on the box or in the packaging, but only in the fine print on the amazon site. Oh well, I'm the idiot, dont make the same mistake yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bent

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: No warning in packaging about not being dishwasher safe. After one washing on top rack they are pitted and missing copper color in huge chunks. The worst product I have ever purchased from Amazon. If I can't return them for my money back they will be in a trash heap in California.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!

product_meta.title: Moscow Mule Copper Mugs Set :4 16 oz. Solid Genuine Copper Mugs Cylindrical Shape : Handmade in India, 4 Straws, 4 Wood Coasters, Shot Glass : Comes in Elegant Gift Box,by Yooreka
feature_bullets: ✅COMPLETE GIFT SET : Your antique copper mugs set contains everything you need for a Moscow Mule party right at home — 4 mugs plus matching straws, mango wood coasters, and shot glass.
✅ 100% PURE COPPER MUGS : With a modern silhouette, these hammered copper mugs are made of all copper — no nickel, tin, or other filler metals to compromise their natural color, beauty & strength.
✅ BEAUTIFULLY HANDCRAFTED: Unlike those that are mass produced in a factory, these large 16-oz. copper mugs are made by hand in India to the highest standards of quality and workmanship.
✅ LACQUER COATING TO PRESERVE SHINE : Each premium copper mug is coated with safe, food-grade lacquer inside and out that makes it tarnish resistant. So your mugs stay looking lustrous over time.
✅ LIFETIME WARRANTY: Your copper cups with handle were designed to elevate the Moscow Mule drinking experience. But if you're not thrilled for any reason, return them for a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
